text: Privacy Policy
Update date: February 22, 2022
Effective date: October 16, 2020
Release date: October 16, 2020

Dear users, thank you for trusting and using our products and services. Recently, we have updated the Privacy Policy. This update has been modified and optimized the personalized recommendation function and added the automatic decision -making of the information system.For rights, please read carefully and fully understand the relevant terms.

[Foreword] Le Element Technology (Beijing) Co., Ltd. and its related parties (referred to as "we" or "Le Element") know the importance of personal information to you. We will protect your personal information in accordance with the provisions of laws and regulationsAnd privacy safety.
We formulate this "privacy policy" and specifically remind: I hope you read and understand the privacy policy carefully before using related services to make appropriate choices.
【Special Note】
• Users under the age of fourteen years old, at the same time, apply this policy and "Personal Information Protection Statement and Guardian Notice".
If the specific terms of specific terms and the terms of the policy have inconsistent agreement, the specific terms shall be subject to specific terms within the scope of the constraints.
If a single service we provide is not applicable to this policy, the service will explicitly explicitly eliminate the applicable policy in an appropriate manner.

• If you need to share your information to the third party in order to provide you, we will ask third parties to take protection measures for your information and strictly abide by relevant laws and regulations and regulatory requirements.
It is necessary to specifically explain that this policy is not applicable to the services you provide in the third direction.

If third parties on our platform rely on this platform to provide you, we will prompt you that the service is provided by independent third parties. The personal information you provided to the third party is not suitable for this privacy policy.

• Before using our various products or services, please be sure to read and thoroughly understand this policy, especially the clauses that are identified by the lines under the body. You should focus on reading.Or service.
Once you start using our products or services, it means that you have fully understood and agree with this policy.
This privacy policy will help you understand:

• We will follow your information to collect and use your information, but we will not collect personal information in a package of compulsory binding because you agree with your consent of the privacy policy.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information

text: We will explain in the privacy policy which is the necessary information.
label: First Party Collection Information

Important

text: The following will help you understand how we collect, use, store, transmit, share, transfer and protect personal information;
Help you understand the way query, access, delete, correction, and withdrawn authorized personal information.
Among them, the important part of the terms of your personal information rights and interests We have reminded in bold forms, please pay special attention.
1. How do we collect and use personal information

1. How do we collect and use personal information

In the process of using our service, we will collect information you actively provide or because of the service when using the service as follows to provide you with your services and ensure your account security:
When you use our products and/or services, we need/may need to collect and use your personal information, including the following:
label: First Party Collection Information

text: 1. In order to realize the basic functions of providing you with our products and/or services, you must authorize the necessary information we collect and use.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: If you refuse to provide the corresponding information, you will not be able to use our products and/or services normally.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: 2. In order to provide you with additional functions to provide you and/or services, you can choose to authorize the information we collect and use.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: If you refuse to provide it, you will not be able to use related additional functions normally or to achieve the functional effects we intend to achieve, but it will not affect your basic functions that use our products and/or services.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: (1) Basic necessary function
1. Register and log in

(1) Mobile phone number registration and login: When you register and log in to related services, you can create an account number through your mobile phone number. The information is collected to help you complete the registration.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Collect the mobile phone number to complete the registration.

text: The mobile phone number belongs to personal sensitive information. If you refuse to provide the "mobile phone number login" method to register and log in, it does not affect your registration and login in other ways, nor does it affect the normal use of other functions.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Refusing to provide mobile phone numbers will not be able to register and log in in the "mobile phone number login" method, but it does not affect the normal use of registered login and other functions in other ways.

text: (2) One -click login: Based on our cooperation with communication operators, when you use the "one -click login of this machine number" function, after your explicit consent, the operator will send us your mobile phone number toYou provide a quick login service.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: When using the "one -click login of this machine number" function, after explicit consent, the operator will send us your mobile phone number to us.

text: The mobile phone number belongs to personal sensitive information. If you refuse to provide the "one -click login of this machine number" to register and log in, but it does not affect your registration in other ways, nor does it affect the normal use of other functions.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: If you refuse to provide a mobile phone number, you will not be able to use the "one -click login of this machine number" to register and log in, but it does not affect the registration and login in other ways.

text: (3) Third -party account login: You can use third -party account WeChat, QQ, and Weibo to log in to use. You will authorize us to obtain the public information (avatar, nickname, and other information you authorized) registered on the third -party platform.Binding with the product account, so that you can log in and use this product and related services directly.

Important
First Party Collection Information

text: If you refuse to agree to obtain the information you authorized from the third party, you will not be able to register your account and log in through WeChat, QQ, and Weibo, nor can you use the third -party account to achieve game data synchronization.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Permission Acquisition
Important
rewrite: If we refuse to agree to obtain the information you authorized from third parties, you will not be able to register your account and log in through WeChat, QQ, and Weibo.

text: 2. Real -name authentication

When you need to use your authentication function or related services, according to relevant laws and regulations, you need to provide your real identity information (real name, ID number) to complete the real -name verification.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Collect real identity information (real name, ID number) to complete the real -name verification.

text: (2) Additional business functions

When you use the product's additional business functions, in order to satisfy you the purpose of providing the product and service, in addition to the registration information, you also need to provide us with your personal identity information, location information, and other services to youInformation, if you do not use specific products and services, you do not need to provide relevant information (the following will be clarified in detail).
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Collect your personal identity information, location information and other information for you.

text: 1. Based on the additional function of the camera/camera.
You can use this function to take photos, videos, and upload avatars after turning on the camera/camera permissions.
label: Permission Acquisition
Important

Important

Important

In the process, we will collect your equipment information, browser types, and log information.

First Party Collection Information

text: 6. Payment function.
You can obtain music element products and/or service -related virtual products, including game coins and game props by paying for music elements.
Please note that the payment function will be provided to you by a third -party payment institution that cooperates with us.
Third -party payment institutions may need to collect your name, bank card type and card number, validity period and mobile phone number.

First Party Collection Information

To show you the transaction information of the account and ensure the security of the transaction, we will collect the information you generate in the process of using our service (including the goods or service information, specific order number, order creation time, transaction amount) for your purchases forShow you and facilitate your management of orders.

First Party Collection Information
rewrite: The information generated during the service process (including the goods or service information you purchased, the specific order number, the order of order creation, and the transaction amount) are used to display and manage orders.

text: 7. Personality services based on telephone management.

When you turn on the power management authority of the device, we may check and read the number of your device that is dialing and suspend the call information, so that you can determine whether you need to mute the audio in the client to ensure the call function.

Important

text: This information is a sensitive information, and refusal to provide this information will only make you unable to use audio in the client for mute processing related functions.

text: 8. Suspension window function.

To help you use our products and services at the same time when using other applications, we will obtain the authority of suspended windows so that our products are displayed above other applications.

Important

text: 9. Safety guarantee function.

In order to improve the security of your services to provide services with our affiliated companies and partners, protect the security of personal property of you or other users or the public, and better prevent fishing websites, fraud, network vulnerabilities, computer viruses, and cyber attacks, Internet intrusion risks, we will collect the necessary information to achieve security guarantee functions.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: It will collect the necessary information to realize the security guarantee function.

text: We may use or integrate your account information, transaction information, equipment information, service log information, and our related companies and partners to obtain information on your authorization or sharing according to law to comprehensively judge your account transaction risk, identity verification, testing, and testing and testing and testingPrevent safety events and take necessary records, audit, analysis, and disposal measures.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: It may use or integrate account information, transaction information, equipment information, service log information, and related companies and partners to obtain authorization or information shared according to law.

First Party Collection Information
